name: 2D Shooter COMPLETE: Guardian Of The Galaxy
name_original: 2D Shooter COMPLETE: Guardian Of The Galaxy
description:
This game is similar to the tutorial, but many modifications were made as well. I chose to stick with 3 significant visual modifications, as I have never coded before and I'm still learning. The three significant modifications are: adding custom home screen music (made on Garage Band by me), adding custom in-game music (made on Garage Band by me), and adding a third "extreme level", where the player has the chance to destroy as many enemies as possible before losing their health, giving them a chance at the high score. I also added a few new sound effects, switched the name, and made some other minor cosmetic changes. Lastly, I fixed the bugs in my tutorial and now the game is bug-free.

Created by: Sydney Bowler
